entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
